greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Period 4: repeat [2, 2, 4, 4].
comment: Continued fraction expansion of (21+5*sqrt(26))/19 = A177153. - _Klaus Brockhaus_, May 03 2010
A045572(n)^a(n) == 1 (mod 10). For n>1, a(n) is the smallest positive exponent with this property. - _Christina Steffan_, Sep 08 2015
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,-1,1).
formula: a(n) = a(n-4) for n>3. - _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Jul 09 2016
results.author: _Paul Curtz_, Sep 07 2009
ext: Edited, offset set to 0, by _R. J. Mathar_, Sep 11 2009
